channel.title: Dueling Arena (safe)
channel.description: how can i make it so when you die in a duel, you dont lose your items, and the spot for dueling is just the basic the dueling arena, please help! thanks.

item.title: Dueling Arena (safe)
item.dc:creator: @surfer25 surfer25
item.description:
@surfer25 wrote:

What server are you running? Before I can make code for you I need to know
The basics are:
You need to set a boolean to state whether you are in the dueling area

boolean duelingArea = true // or false whatever.

Then find where the code is for when a player dies and add

if(duelingArea)    {
    // Dueling area death here
} else {
    // Normal area death here.
}

You also need to set the boolean variable so something like

if(x >= #### && x < #### && y == ####)    {//etc.
    duelingArea = true
}

Read full topic
